prompts.prompt: Is this release a new version of a previously released project?
Was anything in this release copied from preexisting work?
Is anything in this release based on other work?
Was anything in this release translated from other work?
In what country did you write the new material in this release?
In what year did you write the new material in this release?
Were you employed anywhere when you wrote anything new in this release?
Is anything new in this release the slightest bit related to what you do for your employer?
Did you create anything new in this release for anyone else?

derivativeWork.comment: The release is a "derivative work" as defined in section 101 of the Copyright Act.

maybeDerivativeWork.comment: The release may be a "derivative work" as defined in section 101 of the Copyright Act. The questions do not probe whether the release and preexisting work are substantially similar, by addressing factors under the Abstraction-Filtration-Comparison test or Structure-Sequence-Organization tests.
